sentences: Marco ran through the rain.
Lightning flashed in the dark sky and thunder rumbled.
He arrived at a large, old house.
It looked like a castle, big and a bit creepy.
Aysha was waiting for him in the light of the entrance.

content.contentDescription: A large house in Gothic style. There is lightning in the background.

sentences: She smiled and waved.
"Come in! It's just a thunderstorm."
But Marco knew it wasn't just the thunderstorm.
There were ghosts in this house.
He had heard them and sometimes, at night, seen them.
Marco didn't like ghosts.
But he liked Aysha very much.

content.contentDescription: A woman waves and smiles in greeting at the entrance of a large Gothic-style house. In the background, a dark, ghostly figure is visible.

sentences: They went into the kitchen together.
The house creaked.
Aysha made tea and they talked about normal things: work, books, music.
Marco tried to forget the ghosts.
Suddenly they heard a noise upstairs.
Aysha laughed.
"Oh, that's just the house.
It's old."
Marco looked at her.
How could she not be afraid?
Aysha saw his worry and took his hand.
"You get used to it.
The ghosts do nothing.
They are part of the house."

content.contentDescription: A man and a woman sit at the table and drink tea. The woman looks relaxed. In the background, a dark, shadowy figure is visible, as if watching them.

sentences: Marco wanted to be brave.
"Okay," he said and drank his tea.
But deep in his heart, he felt that something was wrong.
Still, he was in love.
And for Aysha, he would accept the ghosts, the creepiness, even his fear.
Night came and they went to bed.
In the dark room, something unknown whispered.
Marco held Aysha's hand tightly.
He would stay.
Out of love.
But he wondered if love was enough to defeat the shadows.

content.contentDescription: A man and a woman in bed. The man looks like he is whispering something to the woman. In the background, a ghostly figure mimics the man, as if mocking him.
